org.apache.derbyTesting.junit

Class ClasspathSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.extensions.TestDecorator
        • junit.extensions.TestSetup
          • org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.ClasspathSetup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class ClasspathSetup
extends junit.extensions.TestSetup

    This decorator adds another resource to the classpath, removing it at tearDown().

      • supportsClose

        public static boolean supportsClose()
        Check whether this platform supports closing a URLClassLoader.
        Returns:
        true if URLClassLoader has a close() method (Java 7 and higher), or false otherwise
